title: Fr. Benedict Groeschel - The Spirit of Sacrifice in the Family
description:
Fr. Benedict Groeschel - The Spirit of Sacrifice in the Family [audio presentation]

Psychologist, speaker, and author Fr. Benedict Groeschel shows how the devastating effects of original sin can be overcome by means of hidden sacrifices made for those we love through which God makes His presence known, allowing us to face challenges with renewed courage and restored faith. With wit and wisdom, he tackles tough issues that can lead to incredible holiness and joy.

---
